hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Engineer & DevOps Enthusiast
hero.title: Building Smart Digital Experiences
hero.description: Crafting scalable apps with clean architecture, automation, and attention to every pixel. From frontend to CI/CD pipelines.

summary.title: Software Engineer crafting modern, scalable solutions
summary.paragraph1: With over 7 years of experience in full-stack software engineering, I design and build robust web platforms that connect performance, reliability, and clean architecture. My expertise spans Java/Spring Boot, Node.js, React, Angular, and cloud-based DevOps environments.
summary.paragraph2: I’m passionate about delivering impactful, long-term solutions and continuously improving systems through automation and best practices.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of personal and technical projects exploring frontend, backend, and DevOps workflows — showcasing my approach to building reliable, scalable, and automated solutions.

smartcalc.title: SmartCalc
smartcalc.description: A minimal yet powerful calculator app built with React and TypeScript, showcasing clean component architecture and state management.

chromaflow.title: ChromaFlow
chromaflow.description: A sleek color palette generator for designers and developers. Generate and copy perfect color combinations in one click.

deploymate.title: DeployMate
deploymate.description: A scalable web dashboard integrated with Docker and AWS, focusing on monitoring CI/CD pipelines and deployment states in real time.

lab.title: The Lab
lab.description: The Lab is my experimental space — where projects, ideas, and technical explorations come together. It’s designed to evolve into a complete hub featuring project showcases, tutorials, and interactive tools for developers.

blog.title: From the Blog
blog.description: Insights, lessons learned, and deep dives into web development, DevOps, and software engineering best practices.

post1.title: Optimizing Next.js Builds for Performance
post1.description: A breakdown of build-time optimizations, ISR, and caching strategies to keep your Next.js apps fast and scalable.

post2.title: Automating CI/CD with GitHub Actions
post2.description: How to set up robust pipelines for testing, building, and deploying applications seamlessly across environments.

post3.title: Building Maintainable React Architectures
post3.description: Structuring your React applications for scalability and clarity using atomic design and reusable patterns.

stack.title: Technical Stack
stack.description: Technologies I work with to design, build, and scale modern web applications — from frontend to backend and cloud environments.

cta.title: Let’s build something great together
cta.description: Whether you’re looking to collaborate on a project, discuss a new idea, or explore potential opportunities — I’m always open to connecting with like-minded professionals and teams.

header.title: About Me
header.description: I'm Mehdi Zayani, a Full Stack Software Engineer with strong experience across backend and frontend development. I design and build scalable, cloud-ready applications using modern frameworks and DevOps practices, delivering reliable and maintainable software solutions for business growth.

whoami.title: Who I Am
whoami.description: I’m a results-driven Software Engineer with a strong focus on building reliable, scalable, and efficient applications. I enjoy solving complex problems, designing clean architectures, and delivering solutions that combine performance, usability, and long-term maintainability.

timeline.title: Freelance Web Developer
timeline.description: Building modern, performant web apps for clients across industries.

timeline.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
timeline.description: Worked on frontend and backend features using Next.js and Node.js.

timeline.title: Master 2 in IT Project Management
timeline.description: Graduated with focus on project management and digital marketing.

timeline.title: Software Engineering Degree
timeline.description: General Software Engineering studies with focus on Full Stack Development.

Contact.title: Get in
Contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi? Let’s connect — I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Footer.description: Fullstack Developer & Engineer crafting digital solutions with clean design and efficient code.

auth.must_accept: You must accept the terms and conditions.
